Installation
============

PIP
---

Install |project| with ``pip``

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install reponame


The development version can be downloaded from `its page at GitHub <https://github.com/Shinyhero36/reponame>`_.

.. code-block:: console

    $ git clone https://github.com/Shinyhero36/reponame
    $ cd reponame
    $ python setup.py develop


Python Version
--------------

It's recommended to use the latest version of Python. |project| support Python 3.6 and newer.


Dependencies
------------

|project| has the following dependencies (which will be automatically
installed if you use ``pip``):

* `Flask <https://flask.palletsprojects.com/en/2.0.x/>`_ version 2.0.X


|project| is now installed. Check out the :doc:`quickstart` or go to the :doc:`Documentation Overview</index>`.
